businessProfile.name: Sammy's House of Pizza
businessProfile.address: 1388 Mineral Spring Ave, North Providence, RI 02904, USA
businessProfile.formatted_address: 1388 Mineral Spring Ave, North Providence, RI 02904, USA

reviews.text: Absolutely delicious.  Our new place to go. There sandwiches are delicious fresh ingredients and they are stuffed, and there pizza is the best I had in over 20 years. Fast delivery also they are all very friendly.  I  will never order pizza or subs from anywhere ele from now on.  Excellent food and prices.

Went to a brewery for trivia (shout out Fool Proof). Realized we needed food, Sammy's came through in a big way. Pizza was delicious, some of the best I've ever had. It's also phenomenal cold and reheated (a crucial stamp of good pizza in my opinion). Will definitely get again. We raved so much, people at the brewery said they would try it :)

I was recommended this place by a coworker. I ordered two pizzas on Thursday 7/17/25. One of them was a chicken and onion pizza. My friend and I ate this pizza and started experiencing some stomach cramping but thought nothing of it. The next morning we both woke up with explosive diarrhea, stomach cramping, nausea, and my friend was actually vomiting. I gave it a day to see if it would go away but it didn't. We've been going on three days with these symptoms and I am wildly upset. He had to leave work early twice and so have I. I don't know if there is a lack of safety around the handling of their chicken or perhaps it was just old but I am highly disappointed. I hope nobody else has had this experience.
We got delivery. It came sooner then expected, still super hot, and the delivery driver was very nice. The food was exactly the way I ordered it, n it was delicious.

Placing our 1st ever order was very easy and pleasant
They have tracking on their orders that was cool
They were exactly on time with their tracking time schedule
Their poppers, chicken fingers and calamari are hot and very good!
Quite impressive Sammy's üíìüëçüèª

recentReviews.text: Sammy‚Äôs house of pizza has a new device Pay upon delivery with your Visa card so with their handy dandy new device they bring the register to your doorstep to pay‚Ä¶I‚Äôm lovin it!
I got delivery tonight food was hot  plenty couldn't finish all so sister ate half and I half we got fish and chips best I had. Wish I took picture before eating it.
The food is always good. The people are friendly. I tried the chicken ceasar wrap and I'm glad I did. It was very good.
My food was delivered but they have the best customer service in RI. I absolutely love the pizza and they deliver fast.

Absolutely delicious.  Our new place to go. There sandwiches are delicious fresh ingredients and they are stuffed, and there pizza is the best I had in over 20 years. Fast delivery also they are all very friendly.  I  will never order pizza or subs from anywhere ele from now on.  Excellent food and prices.

We placed a delivery order. As always things went well. Food was great! Spinach calzone, the spinach was so tasty!! Seasoned just right! I ordered a burger for the first time & it was delicious!! Sammy's is one of our "go to" places!
They didn't send me what I ordered but the food was good.

detailedReviews.author: Audra Votolato
detailedReviews.text: We got delivery. It came sooner then expected, still super hot, and the delivery driver was very nice. The food was exactly the way I ordered it, n it was delicious.

detailedReviews.author: Kerri Coulombe
detailedReviews.text: Great business. Great owner. I drive from Cranston to come to their place. Worth the drive everytime.

detailedReviews.author: Carmen Ducharme
detailedReviews.text: Was my go to place until I waited over an hour for my pizza when I called to see where it was I was told it was on its way . I waited another 15 min and called again I told him im not more than 5 min from you and you told me 15 min ago it was on i t s way. I was then  treated rudely , no apologies no politeness.  I was told it's on its way I don't know what to tell you . I canceled my order and have not ordered from them since . If he would have been apologetic I would have not canceled but when im spending my Hard Earned money and can only treat myself once in awhile the last thing I want is to be treated rudely by the person im giving my business too . Kindness goes a long way .

detailedReviews.author: IRVING MEDINA
detailedReviews.text: Service and food is amazing

detailedReviews.text: Today I ordered the Sammy‚Äôs special small pizza, it is the most delicious pizza I have eaten in a long time.

detailedReviews.author: Paul Pennacchia
detailedReviews.text: Revisited after 20 years. Still the same great sandwiches & pizza! They are now open later on weekends and deliver everywhere!! Take-out, small pizza and 2 sandwiches, didn't disappoint!

detailedReviews.author: Rena Bonollo
detailedReviews.text: Sammy‚Äôs never disappoints. Food is always hot, fresh snd delicious.

detailedReviews.text: First time ordering and food was very good.  Will definitely sept try again

detailedReviews.author: mybuddy teevee
detailedReviews.text: Ordered delivery.  Food was very good.  Delivery was fast. Driver was super courteous.  A+ from me

detailedReviews.author: Paula Chirichella
detailedReviews.text: The food is always fresh, hot and delicious. The club sandwiches are fantastic, the salads are really good as is the pizza. And delivery is always quick and driver is friendly. Made the mistake of ordering from some place else and hubby was disappointed. Will never make that mistake again. Sammys is our go to place for sandwiches, salads, and non Sicilian pizza.

detailedReviews.author: Heidi Springthorpe
detailedReviews.text: Do not recommend. Undercooked pizza and iceberg lettuce Caesar salad. All toppings fell off on each piece he tried to pick up.  Phone operator was super cool and I‚Äôd hire her in a second when this closes. Solid phone skills girl!

detailedReviews.text: Great food and quick delivery!

detailedReviews.author: Amanda Pontarelli
detailedReviews.text: Love it, thank you.

detailedReviews.author: Krysten Cioe
detailedReviews.text: Great place! Prices are good and food always arrives hot. And the lady that answered the phone was extremely helpful and knowledgeable.  We order at least 3x"s a week.

detailedReviews.author: Kenny Td
detailedReviews.text: Wow love food

detailedReviews.author: Alejandra De Paz
detailedReviews.text: Went in tonight and the service was excellent. The girl in the front was so kind and the cooks were working really hard to get everyone‚Äôs orders out as soon as possible. I typically don‚Äôt share reviews but I‚Äôm a regular here and it‚Äôs always pretty good and the service tonight was awesome!

detailedReviews.author: Dina M Audette
detailedReviews.text: Food was delivered hot! The large calzones could have fed 2-3 people. Everything was made fresh and delicious. Large portions.

detailedReviews.text: mold in my tiramisu :(

detailedReviews.author: Deloris Mitchell
detailedReviews.text: I have a gluten allergy and it is hard to find safe and delicious comfort food. However, Sammy's gluten free pizza has become one of my favorites!

detailedReviews.author: J swift
detailedReviews.text: Food was excellent but 1 sandwich 10 mins away took  1 hour after they said 30-45 mins

detailedReviews.author: Harmonie Charland
detailedReviews.text: Got delivery! Good came fast n was hot! Everytime we get delivery from Sammy‚Äôs the food comes quick, is hot, and tasty never had a bad experience.

detailedReviews.author: PhantomXPlays Phantom
detailedReviews.text: I was recommended this place by a coworker. I ordered two pizzas on Thursday 7/17/25. One of them was a chicken and onion pizza. My friend and I ate this pizza and started experiencing some stomach cramping but thought nothing of it. The next morning we both woke up with explosive diarrhea, stomach cramping, nausea, and my friend was actually vomiting. I gave it a day to see if it would go away but it didn't. We've been going on three days with these symptoms and I am wildly upset. He had to leave work early twice and so have I. I don't know if there is a lack of safety around the handling of their chicken or perhaps it was just old but I am highly disappointed. I hope nobody else has had this experience.

detailedReviews.author: Lennie
detailedReviews.text: Food was excellent delivery was within 40 mins on a Friday at 600pm incredible we had fish & chips and fried shrimp & onion rings superb thank you Sammy's is the best

detailedReviews.author: Rosemarie Hazard
detailedReviews.text: Food was nice and hot and pizza was so delicious sauce was very sweet and thick  and the price was worth every bite best pizza we every ate can't wait to try more of there food. Delivery guy was kool .

detailedReviews.author: Gabe Lebel
detailedReviews.text: Went to a brewery for trivia (shout out Fool Proof). Realized we needed food, Sammy's came through in a big way. Pizza was delicious, some of the best I've ever had. It's also phenomenal cold and reheated (a crucial stamp of good pizza in my opinion). Will definitely get again. We raved so much, people at the brewery said they would try it :)

customerMoodAnalysis.sentimentSummary: Customers are genuinely thrilled with their experience. With an average 4.7/5 rating across 100 recent reviews, your restaurant consistently exceeds expectations.

strengthsPerceived: Customers love the fast and friendly delivery service, with food arriving hot and sooner than expected. - Boostly marketing services can amplify this
The portions are large and the ingredients are fresh, making the food not only delicious but also a great value. - social media marketing can showcase this strength
The innovative payment option of paying upon delivery with a Visa card at the doorstep is a hit with customers. - SEO services can leverage this for better visibility
improvementOpportunities: Negative reviews and reputation issues due to rude customer service and food safety concerns - review management can address this concern
Long wait times and delivery issues - Boostly marketing services can improve this
Poor online visibility and competition issues - SEO services can solve this visibility issue
